Description: Wall sherd of East Greek (South Ionian?) pottery cup; fine orange clay with much silver mica; very worn inside and out; inscription cut on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 320)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 670, no. 281)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.879)
